tuv.seg: Familarize your self with content production guideline and start sharing your visions.
Tutustu sisällöntuoton ohjenuoriin ja aloita omien ajatuksiesi jakaminen.
Ideas are related to challenges or visions found in the Massidea database.
Massidean tietokannassa ideat aina liittyvät tulevaisuustietoon tai haasteeseen.
In other words, ideas are answers or solutions to current challenges or visions of the future.
Toisin sanoin, ideat ovat vastauksia tai ratkaisuja tämän päivän haasteisiin tai tulevaisuuden visioihin.
Visions of the future concern the future, not the present day.
Tulevaisuustiedot koskevat jotain tulevaa, eivät nykyistä tilannetta.
Vision can be a future scenario, trend or anti-trend, which is expected to be realized. It can also be seed of change or a weak signal from the future which might become reality.
Tulevaisuustieto voi olla skenaario, trendi tai antitrendi, jota odotetaan toteutuvaksi. Tämä voi tarkoittaa myös muutoksen siementä tai heikkoa signaalia tulevaisuudesta, joka voisi toteutua.
Problems and obstacles are stopping us from achieving our goals.
Ongelmat ja haasteet estävät meitä tavoittamasta päämääriämme.
Whether it's a question of business or personal life related issues, we can turn problems into challenges and start solving them.
On kyseessä työelämän tai henkilökohtaisen ongelma, voimme muuttaa onglman haasteeksi ja aloittaa niiden ratkaisemisen.

How to write a good challenge?
How to write a good challenge?
Focus on writing only about the challenge and not it's solutions. Solutions are kept separate form the challenge thus allowing multiple solutions to the same challenge.
Focus on writing only about the challenge and not it's solutions. Solutions are kept separate form the challenge thus allowing multiple solutions to the same challenge.
Explain clearly 1) what the challenge is and 2) why it is important to solve it.
Explain clearly 1) what the challenge is and 2) why it is important to solve it.
Write for a person who is not familiar with the topic.
Write for a person who is not familiar with the topic.
Most importantly you are trying to motivate others to offer their solutions.
Most importantly you are trying to motivate others to offer their solutions.
Title, subheader and keywords are important, as they will determine how attractive your article is and whether others will find it.
Title, subheader and keywords are important, as they will determine how attractive your article is and whether others will find it.
Define the research question to which you need an answer. This will also help you to write more focused.
Define the research question to which you need an answer. This will also help you to write more focused.
Altough English is preferred as the universal language.
Altough English is preferred as the universal language.
Include references in your article (at least the website in which the article can be found or the name and number of the magazine).
Include references in your article (at least the website in which the article can be found or the name and number of the magazine).
How to write a good vision?
How to write a good vision?
Focus on writing about one specific future vision, not about the general view of the forthcoming.
Focus on writing about one specific future vision, not about the general view of the forthcoming.
Explain clearly 1) what the future vision is and estimate 2) when and 3) how likely the vision is expected to be realized.
Explain clearly 1) what the future vision is and estimate 2) when and 3) how likely the vision is expected to be realized.
Write for a person who is not familiar with the topic.
Write for a person who is not familiar with the topic.
Most importantly you are trying to motivate others to offer their ideas and challenges based on your vision.
Most importantly you are trying to motivate others to offer their ideas and challenges based on your vision.
Identify the most important threat and opportunity when your vision is realized.
Identify the most important threat and opportunity when your vision is realized.
Title, subheader and keywords are important, as they will determine how attractive your article is and whether others will find it.
Title, subheader and keywords are important, as they will determine how attractive your article is and whether others will find it.
Altough English is preferred as the universal language.
Altough English is preferred as the universal language.
Include references in your article (at least the website in which the article can be found or the name and number of the magazine).
Include references in your article (at least the website in which the article can be found or the name and number of the magazine).
How to write a good idea?
How to write a good idea?
Focus on writing only about the idea.
Focus on writing only about the idea.
Explain clearly 1) what the idea is and 2) why it is going to work.
Explain clearly 1) what the idea is and 2) why it is going to work.
Write for a person who is not familiar with the topic to make your article easily understandable.
Write for a person who is not familiar with the topic to make your article easily understandable.
Most importantly you are trying to motivate others to further develop your idea or take it into practice.
Most importantly you are trying to motivate others to further develop your idea or take it into practice.
Title, subheader and keywords are important, as they will determine how attractive your article is and whether others will find it.
Title, subheader and keywords are important, as they will determine how attractive your article is and whether others will find it.
Define your idea in one sentence
Define your idea in one sentence
Altough English is preferred as the universal language.
Altough English is preferred as the universal language.
Include references in your article (at least the website in which the article can be found or the name and number of the magazine).
Include references in your article (at least the website in which the article can be found or the name and number of the magazine).

ul.li: OIBS content is short descriptions of today’s challenges, visions of the future and the related ideas and solutions.
All content is in the form of an A4 sheet, with the min. length of 1500 marks.
Describe the problem or vision accurately.
Include references in your writing
All content is open and public. Therefore, ideas planned to be patented are not recommended to be added into the database.
The current OIBS is a demo version. Thus, when adding new content we recommend to save a copy of the material for the possible re-adding process into the new version.
To add an idea, it has to relate to the content found in the OIBS database. In other words, there has to be a challenge or vision what the idea is for.
OIBS:in aineisto on lyhyitä kuvauksia tämän päivän haasteista, tulevaisuuden näkymistä sekä niihin tarjotuista ideoista.
Kaikki aineisto on A4-arkin muodossa, min. pituus on 1500 merkkiä.
Kuvaile ongelma tai visio mahdollisimman tarkasti.
Sisällytä lähteet kirjoitukseesi.
Kaikki OIBS:n sisältö on avointa ja julkista. Patentoitavaksi suunniteltuja ideoita ei siis kannata tallentaa järjestelmään.
Sivusto on demoversio. Säilytä kopio tallentamastasi materiaalista, jotta mahdollinen uudelleentalletus sivuston uuteen versioon onnistuu vaivattomasti.
Lisätäksesi jonkin uuden idean, sen on liityttävä tietokannasta jo löytyvään aineistoon. Toisin sanoen ideat (ratkaisut) ovat vastauksia tietokannasta löytyviin ongelmiin tai tulevaisuuden visioihin.
In order to add new content into OIBS, register or log in with your account.
Start by browsing the content or by adding a new challenge or a new vision.
Ideas can be added only when they relate to the content found in the database. In other words, there has to be a challenge or a vision, what the solution if for.
All content is open and public. Therefore, ideas planned to be patented are not recommended to be added into the database.
The current OIBS website is a demo version. When adding new content, it’s recommended to save a copy of the material for the possible re-adding process into the new version of the website.
Rekisteröidy tai kirjaudu sisään tunnuksillasi lisätäksesi tietokantaan uutta aineistoa.
Aloita joko selaamalla sivuston aineistoa tai lisäämällä tietokantaan jokin tämän päivän ongelma tai tulevaisuuden visio.
Ideoita voidaan ainoastaan lisätä tietokannasta löytyvään aineistoon. Toisin sanoen ideat (ratkaisut) ovat vastauksia kuvailtuihin ongelmiin tai tulevaisuuden visioihin.
Kaikki OIBS:n sisältö on avointa ja julkista. Patentoitavaksi suunniteltuja ideoita ei siis kannata tallentaa järjestelmään.
Sivusto on demoversio. Pidä itselläsi kopio tallentamastasi materiaalista, jotta mahdollinen uudelleentalletus sivuston uuteen versioon onnistuu vaivattomasti.

tuv.seg: Problems and obstacles are stopping us from achieving our goals. Whether it's a question of business or personal life related issues, we can turn problems into challenges and start solving them.
Problems and obstacles are stopping us from achieving our goals. Whether it's a question of business or personal life related issues, we can turn problems into challenges and start solving them.
Follow the instructions on the right and upload your challenge into Massidea.org, and let the community offer you new solutions.
Follow the instructions on the right and upload your challenge into Massidea.org, and let the community offer you new solutions.

Your topic must concern the future, not the present day. Vision can be a future scenario, trend or anti-trend, which is expected to be realized. It can also be seed of change or a weak signal from the future which might become reality.

Your topic must concern the future, not the present day. Vision can be a future scenario, trend or anti-trend, which is expected to be realized. It can also be seed of change or a weak signal from the future which might become reality.
Your topic can cover e.g. future technology or science, new needs, political or legislative decision.
Your topic can cover e.g. future technology or science, new needs, political or legislative decision.
Ideas are always related to a challenge or a vision found in the Massidea database. In other words, ideas are answers or solutions to current challenges or visions of the future.
Ideas are always related to a challenge or a vision found in the Massidea database. In other words, ideas are answers or solutions to current challenges or visions of the future.
